document.id: City of San Mateo, Cal., Ord. No. 2013-13
document.heading: AMENDING TITLE 23 OF THE SAN MATEO MUNICIPAL CODE TO ADOPT THE ADMINISTRATIVE CODE AS CHAPTER 23.06, AND THE 2013 EDITION OF THE CALIFORNIA BUILDING, RESIDENTIAL, ELECTRICAL, MECHANICAL, PLUMBING, EXISTING BUILDING AND GREEN BUILDING CODES; TO ADOPT THE NOISE REGULATIONS CODE SPECIAL PROVISIONS 7.30.060
